entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:35 a.m. PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
